raw_comment: One thing we noticed in the graph was that spring comes sooner and the places that had higher elevations and the places that are farther north get spring faster. One question that we had was what sources did they use to get this information? The thing that we noticed that was going on in the graph was that it showed one when spring would come to the different regions of the U.S.
ace_sentences: We noticed one thing in the graph.
The places that have higher elevations get spring faster.
The places that are farther north get spring faster.
We asked what sources they used to get this information.
We noticed another thing in the graph.
The graph shows when spring comes to different regions of the U.S.
